entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Tatlayoko Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:40 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tatlayoko Lake 1:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: 2.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: 0.7°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Ice pellets mixed with snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Ice pellets mixed with snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early this afternoon. Ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon except gusting to 60 over southern sections late this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h except gusting to 60 over southern sections. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the morning then rising. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h except gusting to 60 over southern sections. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the morning then rising. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
